name: Attack on Titan Forever
description:
/!\ If you haven't seen the anime, it may spoil to Season 3

Attack on Titan Forever is a 2D fangame base on Attack on Titan.

Fight titan to save humanity in a 2D pixel art world constantly attacked by titans that want to eat you!

- 14 Playable Characters
- A big world
- Different type of titans
- 2 AoT Cover + 1 New soundtrack
Playable with Gamepad and Keyboard+Mouse

V.1 :

  • Game launch !
